authors.name: Sabina Guillan
authors.description: Sabina Guillan is a translator who works in our city at CIERG teaching General English, Biology, Literature and Drama. She is also a teacher at EXCEL where she works with the youngest learners.

authors.name: Roberto Tivane
authors.description: Roberto Tivane got a Bachelor’s Degree in TEFL at UP Maxixe, Mozambique and a Master’s Degree in Applied Linguistics in the field of TEFL at the European University of the Atlantic, Spain.

authors.name: Cristina Banfi
authors.description: Dr. Cristina Banfi is an Italian/Argentine graduate teacher of the IES en LV “JRF” in Buenos Aires, with an MPhil from the University of Cambridge and a PhD from University College London.

authors.name: Sandra Dezi
authors.description: Sandra Dezi has a Teaching Degree in English as a Foreign Language, a Bachelor’s Degree in Educational Technology at UTN, a Master’s Degree in Applied Linguistics in the field of TEFL at the European University of the Atlantic and Universidad Iberoamericana, Spain.

authors.name: Fabiola Montoni
authors.description: Fabiola Pabla Montoni Isaac is an experienced teacher working at Public Secondary School, EADEB and ISPRG.
